channel.title: Changing stats
channel.description: yes i wanted to know some thing abou my range stat what number is it like you kow how health is #3 and mage is #6? well which is range and what number do i set it to so i can 1 hit ko peeple?im not gonna abuse it but just ta like use it wen im tired of fighting some1 that comes back for more after he knows that i own him lolz?

Uh, you could …i have no idea, im sorry. You might be able to change the speed of it so that you shoot an arrow every half a sec or something lol. Then get 99 range and blast them away!

item.title: Changing stats
item.dc:creator: @Stilles Stilles
item.description:
@Stilles wrote:

Um, i dont know about 1-hitting, but you could logout, change a stat to a number and then log back in to see which changed. Eventually you will find out which one it is :). If you want a exp table google it, i think tip it has one…

[hr]
Ah, i just figured out, its playerlevel[4].

Read full topic
